publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4204 Lewis Macdonald: Cinnamon Aberdeen, Scottish Curry Awards Winner—That the Parliament congratulates the Cinnamon restaurant in Aberdeen on its success in being named the top place in Scotland to enjoy Indian cuisine at the Scottish Curry Awards 2009; acknowledges that this is the second year in a row that the restaurant has won the award, adding to its already prestigious British Curry Award for Best Restaurant in Scotland and Northern Ireland for 2008; congratulates all those who took part in the awards ceremony, and wishes Cinnamon and all Aberdeen’s thriving and successful Indian restaurants every success in the future.

S3M-4204 Lewis Macdonald: Cinnamon Aberdeen, Scottish Curry Awards Winner—That the Parliament congratulates the Cinnamon restaurant in Aberdeen on its success in being named the top place in Scotland to enjoy Indian cuisine at the Scottish Curry Awards 2009; acknowledges that this is the second year in a row that the restaurant has won the award, adding to its already prestigious British Curry Award for Best Restaurant in Scotland and Northern Ireland for 2008; congratulates all those who took part in the awards ceremony, and wishes Cinnamon and all Aberdeen’s thriving and successful Indian restaurants every success in the future. Supported by: Gil Paterson*, Jim Tolson*, Stuart McMillan*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Alison McInnes*, Nigel Don*, Karen Whitefield*, Robin Harper*, Brian Adam*, Sarah Boyack*, Richard Baker*, Nanette Milne*, Jackie Baillie*, James Kelly*, Alex Johnstone*, Hugh Henry*, Marilyn Livingstone*, John Park*
S3M-4204 Cinnam on Aberdeen, Scottish Curry Awards Winner (lodged on 20 May 2009) Mary Mulligan*, Jam ie McGrigor*, Aileen Cam pbell*, Maureen Watt*, Dr Richard Simpson*
